class.name: PLATEAUHeightMapData
class.brief_description: Container for heightmap data and metadata.
class.description: PLATEAUHeightMapData stores generated heightmap data along with metadata such as bounds and UV coordinates. It can save heightmaps to files and generate meshes from the heightmap data. [b]Note:[/b] This class is not available on mobile platforms (iOS/Android/visionOS).

method.name: get_width
method.description: Returns the width of the heightmap in pixels.

method.name: get_height
method.description: Returns the height of the heightmap in pixels.

method.name: get_min_bounds
method.description: Returns the minimum bounds of the heightmap in local coordinates.

method.name: get_max_bounds
method.description: Returns the maximum bounds of the heightmap in local coordinates.

method.name: get_min_uv
method.description: Returns the minimum UV coordinates for texture mapping.

method.name: get_max_uv
method.description: Returns the maximum UV coordinates for texture mapping.

method.name: get_heightmap_raw
method.description: Returns the heightmap data as raw bytes (uint16 array).

method.name: get_heightmap_normalized
method.description: Returns the heightmap as normalized float array [0.0 - 1.0].

method.name: save_png
method.description: Save the heightmap as a PNG file. Returns [code]true[/code] on success. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS/visionOS).

method.name: save_raw
method.description: Save the heightmap as raw binary data. Returns [code]true[/code] on success. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS/visionOS).

method.name: generate_mesh
method.description: Generate a mesh from the heightmap data. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS/visionOS).

members.member: Path to the diffuse texture for this terrain.
